detectors.description:
ZOMBIEDAIPool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZOMBIEDAIPool.sol#724-746) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZOMBIEDAIPool.sol#731)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZOMBIEDAIPool.sol#734)
